content: this sweet little stocking is the perfect size to hold a gift card knit one to give a gift in or lots to make a garland they would also make lovely ornaments to go on the tree they are a great stashbusting project using such a small amount of yarn finished measurements approximately 7 tall including loop and 2 75 across materials us size 6 4mm dpns knit picks wool of the andes worsted- c1 white c2 firecracker heather c3 forest heather one ball each yarn needle gauge 24 sts and 32 rnds = 4 inches in stockinette st notes the stocking is worked in the round from the cuff to the toe an i-cord loop is then worked and sewn on there are three options for the body of the stocking all three start out with the same cuff after working the cuff choose the directions for the three color striped version two color striped version or solid color version the toe is then worked and is the same for all three versions
